author: J. Johnson

review: That's right, I love, love, LOVE Google's Chromecast!  It is simply the best electronic device I have purchased in years.  So much so that I bought TWO of them so I could use one in my Family Room and one in my Master Bedroom.  Set-up only takes a few minutes, so simple, the connection works flawlessly, and you can stream ANYTHING you want to watch from your laptop, smart phone, or even PC if connected wirelessly to your TVs.  My wife and I cut down to basic cable years ago because we watch almost everything online for FREE.  Why pay a subscription or extra for a DVR option when you can wait a day and watch almost anything online for free?  Less than $60 on Amazon has afforded us extremely easy access to streaming media in two rooms of our house.  It's AWESOME, highly recommend!
author: Macadamia

review: I unfortunately did not have this great experience that everyone else does.  The image is blurry, and jumpy, and the sound does not match up with the people talking.  I will just stick to running a cable to the TV, for perfect picture and sound everytime!  While $35 isn't much, it was a waste of money.
